key.name: show-workspace-indicator
key.description: Show workspace indicator in the top panel displaying workspace numbers for each monitor

key.description: When focus changes via keyboard (Alt+Tab, dock, etc.), move pointer to the center of the newly focused window

key.name: raise-on-cycle-focus
key.description: When cycling focus between windows, also raise the window to the top of the stack
